pullRequest.title: [bluetooth] Added support for connection based discovery
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #7007
Includes following enhancements:

Allows discovery participants to query the characteristics of the bluetooth device before issuing a DiscoveryResult
BluetoothDiscoveryService now prevents publications of duplicate DiscoveryResults in order to minimize cpu.
Discovered bluetooth devices are now passed to discovery participants asynchronously
Optimized discovery by allowing prior DiscoveryResults be reused when same device is discovered on another BluetoothAdapter.
Unit tests for everything mentioned above.
